Package weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute

Class TweetToFeatureVector

java.lang.Object
weka.filters.Filter
weka.filters.SimpleFilter
weka.filters.SimpleBatchFilter
weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.TweetToFeatureVector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, CommandlineRunnable, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DistantSupervisionSyntheticFilter, PMILexiconExpander, TweetCentroid, TweetToEmbeddingsFeatureVector, TweetToInputLexiconFeatureVector, TweetToLexiconFeatureVector, TweetToSentiStrengthFeatureVector, TweetToSparseFeatureVector, TweetToWordListCountFeatureVector
public abstract class TweetToFeatureVector extends SimpleBatchFilter
An abstract Weka filter for calculating attributes from tweets.
